{{VO/Story
|character           = {{ROOTPAGENAME}}
|language            = ko
|name                = 신염

|vo_01_01_title      = 첫 만남…
|vo_01_01_subtitle   = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = 난 신염이야. 리월항의 유일한 로커지. 요즘 순회공연 좀 다녀볼까 하는데, 목적지는…. 넌 여러 곳을 돌아다니는 여행자지? 어디든 좋으니 나도 좀 끼워줘라!
|vo_01_01_rm         = Nan Sin-yeom-iya. Riwol-Hang-ui yuilhan rokeo-ji. Yojeum sunhoegong-yeon jom danyeobolkka haneunde, mokjeokjineun... Neon yeoreo gos-eul dor-adanineun yeohaengjaji? Eodideun joh-euni nado jom kkiwojwora!
|vo_01_01_tl         = I'm Xinyan. Liyue Harbor's only rocker. I'm thinking of going to a concert tour these days, but for the destination... You're a traveler going many places, right? Anywhere is fine, so please count me in, too!

|vo_02_01_title      = 잡담・기세
|vo_02_01_subtitle   = Chat: Vigor
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Vigor.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = 로큰롤에 열정은 필수야&mdash;&mdash;이봐, 뭘 멍하니 있는 거야, 움직이라고!
|vo_02_01_rm         = Rokeunnor-e yeoljeong-eun pilsuya&mdash;&mdash;Ibwa, mwol meonghani inneun geoya, umjig-irago!
|vo_02_01_tl         = Passion is essential for rock 'n' roll&mdash; Hey, what're you doing, move it!

|vo_02_02_title      = 잡담・신곡
|vo_02_02_subtitle   = Chat: New Song
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - New Song.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = 아니면 내가 새로 쓴 곡 연주해줄까?
|vo_02_02_rm         = Animyeon naega saero sseun gok yeonjuhaejulkka?
|vo_02_02_tl         = Wanna hear a new song I wrote?

|vo_02_03_title      = 잡담・주목
|vo_02_03_subtitle   = Chat: Look!
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Look!.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = 저길 봐! 엄청 로큰롤한 게 있어!
|vo_02_03_rm         = Jeogil bwa! Eomcheong rokeunnolhan ge iss-eo!
|vo_02_03_tl         = Look over there! That's very rock 'n' roll!

|vo_03_01_title      = 비가 올 때…
|vo_03_01_subtitle   = When It Rains
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx         = 비가 많이 오네…. 내 악기가 젖으면 안 되는데
|vo_03_01_rm         = Biga manh-i one... Nae akgi-ga jeoj-eumyeon an doeneunde
|vo_03_01_tl         = It's raining too much... I can't get my instruments wet.

|vo_03_02_title      = 번개가 칠 때…
|vo_03_02_subtitle   = When Thunder Strikes
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} When Thunder Strikes.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = 당분간 비가 계속 내릴 것 같아…. 흠, 그래도 공연을 미룰 순 없지!
|vo_03_02_rm         = Dangbun-gan biga gyesok naeril geot gat-a... Heum, geuraedo gong-yeon-eul mirul sun eopji!
|vo_03_02_tl         = Looks like it will keep raining for a while... Hmm, the show can't just be postponed though!

|vo_03_03_title      = 눈이 올 때…
|vo_03_03_subtitle   = When It Snows
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx         = 흐음… 이런 날씨엔 관중들을 어떻게 모으지? 그래! 「눈보라 속 극한의 인내심으로 로큰롤에 도전」 같은 건 어때?!
|vo_03_03_rm         = Heueum... ireon nalssien gwanjungdeur-eul eotteoke mo-euji? Geurae! "Nunbora sok geukhan-ui innaesim-euro rokeunnor-e dojeon" gat-eun geon eottae?!
|vo_03_03_tl         = Hmm... how do you get a crowd in this weather? Oh wait! How about something like an "Extremely-patient rock 'n' roll in a snowstorm" challenge?!

|vo_03_04_title      = 강풍이 불 때…
|vo_03_04_subtitle   = When the Wind Is Blowing
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Wind Is Blowing.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx         = 으악, 빨리 피해야겠어. 안 그럼 헤어 스타일이 다 망가질 거야!
|vo_03_04_rm         = Euak, ppalli pihaeyagess-eo. An geureom heeo seutair-i da mang-gajil geoya!
|vo_03_04_tl         = Whoa, I need to get out of here quickly. Otherwise, my hair will be ruined!

|vo_04_01_title      = 아침 인사…
|vo_04_01_subtitle   = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx         = 좋은 아침, 방금 목 좀 풀어봤는데 오늘도 상태가 좋아
|vo_04_01_rm         = Joh-eun achim, bang-geum mok jom pur-eobwanneunde oneuldo sangtaega joh-a
|vo_04_01_tl         = Good morning, I just warmed up my voice, and I'm feeling better today.

|vo_04_02_title      = 점심 인사…
|vo_04_02_subtitle   = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = 끝났다, 끝났어. 하암&mdash;&mdash;별일 없으면 잠깐 좀 잘래…
|vo_04_02_rm         = Kkeunnatda, kkeunnass-eo. Haam&mdash;&mdash; byeor-il eobs-eumyeon jamkkan jom jallae...
|vo_04_02_tl         = It's over, it's over. (Yawns)&mdash; if there's nothing special going on, let's take a break...

|vo_04_03_title      = 저녁 인사…
|vo_04_03_subtitle   = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = 곧 공연 시작이야. 너도 같이 놀아볼래?
|vo_04_03_rm         = Got gong-yeon sijag-iya. Neodo gach-i nor-abollae?
|vo_04_03_tl         = The show is starting soon. Would you like to sing together?

|vo_04_04_title      = 굿나잇…
|vo_04_04_subtitle   = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = 알겠어. 먼저 가서 자. 나? 난 악기도 관리해야 하고 편곡도 하고 싶은데. 헤헤, 막 무대에서 내려오면 피곤해도 잠이 안 와
|vo_04_04_rm         = Algess-eo. Meonjeo gaseo ja. Na? Nan akgido gwallihaeya hago pyeon-gokdo hago sip-eunde. Hehe, mak mudaeeseo naeryeoomyeon pigonhaedo jam-i an wa
|vo_04_04_tl         = Alright. You can go to bed first. Me? I also have to take care of the instruments and I want to arrange compositions. Hehe, I just got off the stage and I can't go to sleep even though I'm tired.

|vo_05_01_title      = 신염 자신에 대해・흉악
|vo_05_01_subtitle   = About {character}: Frightening
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Frightening.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = 넌 내가 무섭지 않다고? 허, 어떤 사람들은 내 눈빛이 날카롭고, 옷과 말투도 단정치 못하다면서 날 보면 멀찌감치 도망가버려. 휴…스타일이 다른 것뿐이지, 내가 무슨 괴물도 아닌데 말이야…
|vo_05_01_rm         = Neon naega museopji antago? Heo, eotteon saramdeur-eun nae nunbich-i nalkaropgo, otgwa maltudo danjeongchi mothadamyeonseo nal bomyeon meoljjigamchi domang-gabeoryeo. Hyu...seutair-i dareun geotppun-iji, naega museun goemuldo aninde mar-iya...
|vo_05_01_tl         = Are you not afraid of me? Huh, some people say that my eyes are piercing, my clothes and my tone are messy, and when they see me, they run away. Sigh... it's just a different style, I'm not a monster...

|vo_05_02_title      = 신염 자신에 대해・록
|vo_05_02_subtitle   = About {character}: Rock 'N' Roll
|vo_05_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Rock 'N' Roll.ogg
|vo_05_02_tx         = 로큰롤은 폰타인에서 건너온 신문물이야. 음, 하지만 리월에선 인기가 없어. 보통 시끄럽다고 싫어하더라구. 그래서 내 노랠 들으러 와주는 팬들이 더 고마워. 하하
|vo_05_02_rm         = Rokeunnor-eun Pontain-eseo geonneoon sinmunmur-iya. Eum, hajiman Riwor-eseon ingiga eobs-eo. Botong sikkeureobdago sirh-eohadeoragu. Geuraeseo nae norael deur-eureo wajuneun paendeur-i deo gomawo. Haha
|vo_05_02_tl         = Rock 'n' roll came to me from a newspaper article in Fontaine. Um, but it's not popular in Liyue. They usually hate it because it's noisy. That's why I'm even more grateful to the fans who come to listen to my songs. Haha!

|vo_06_01_title      = 우리에 대해・관람
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About Us: The Audience
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - The Audience.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = 내 공연 보러 온 거야? 하하, 앞으로 와! 앞쪽이 더 좋아. 흠흠, 그럼 지금부터 리월항의 하나뿐인 로큰롤 공연을 시작합니다!
|vo_06_01_rm         = Nae gong-yeon boreo on geoya? Haha, ap-euro wa! Apjjog-i deo joh-a. Heumheum, geureom jigeumbuteo Riwol-Hang-ui hanappun-in rokeunnol gong-yeon-eul sijakhamnida!
|vo_06_01_tl         = Are you here to see my show? Haha, come to the front! The front is better. Hmmm-hmmm, then from now on, the one and only rock 'n' roll performance of Liyue Harbor begins!

|vo_06_02_title      = 우리에 대해・의기투합
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About Us: Kindred Spirits
|vo_06_02_friendship = 6
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Kindred Spirits.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = 너랑은 왜 이렇게 말이 잘 통하나 했더니 넌 이 세계 사람이 아니었구나. 그래서 이 세계의 규율을 신경 쓸 필요가 없었던 거야&mdash;&mdash;인생이 그래야지! 허례허식 따위 개나 주라고 해. 구속 없이, 자유롭게!
|vo_06_02_rm         = Neorang-eun wae ireoke mar-i jal tonghana haetdeoni neon i segye saram-i anieotguna. Geuraeseo i segyeui gyuyur-eul sin-gyeong sseul pir-yoga eobs-eotdeon geoya&mdash;&mdash; Insaeng-i geuraeyaji! Heoryeheosik ttawi gaena jurago hae. Gusok eobs-i, jayuropge!
|vo_06_02_tl         = When I asked why I get along so well with you, you said weren't from this world. Which is why you didn't have to care about the rules of this world&mdash; that's how life should be! Drop the formalities and the like and say what you want. Without control, be free!

|vo_06_03_title      = 우리에 대해・초대
|vo_06_03_subtitle   = About Us: Invitation
|vo_06_03_friendship = 6
|vo_06_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Invitation.ogg
|vo_06_03_tx         = 난 내 로큰롤을 더 풍부하게 만들고 싶어. 너 리듬감 좋던데, 드럼 좀 쳐볼래? 안 해봤다고? 에이, 주눅들 필요 없어. 자신감이 제일 중요해! 한번 해봐, 분명 재능 있을 거야!
|vo_06_03_rm         = Nan nae rokeunnor-eul deo pungbuhage mandeulgo sip-eo. Neo rideumgam joteonde, deureom jom chyeobollae? An haebwatdago? Ei, junukdeul pir-yo eobs-eo. Jasin-gam-i jeil jung-yohae! Hanbeon haebwa, bunmyeong jaeneung iss-eul geoya!
|vo_06_03_tl         = I want to enrich my rock 'n' roll. You have a good sense of rhythm, would you like to play the drums? Never did it [before]? Hey, there's no need to panic. Confidence is the most important thing! Give it a try, you must be talented!

|vo_07_01_title      = 「신의 눈」에 대해…
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the Vision
|vo_07_01_friendship = 4
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = 「신의 눈」의 불을 로큰롤 반주로 사용하는 사람은 아마 티바트 대륙에서 나밖에 없을 거야. 존귀한 힘을 이런 데 썼다고 비난하는 사람들도 있지만…신이 나한테 「신의 눈」을 주셨다는 건, 내가 사용하는 방법을 인정해주신 거 아닐까?
|vo_07_01_rm         = "Sin-ui Nun"-ui bur-eul rokeunnol banjuro sayonghaneun saram-eun ama Tibateu daeryug-eseo nabakk-e eobs-eul geoya. Jongwihan him-eul ireon de sseotdago binanhaneun saramdeuldo itjiman... Sin-i nahante "Sin-ui Nun"-eul jusyeotdaneun geon, naega sayonghaneun bangbeob-eul injeonghaejusin geo anilkka?
|vo_07_01_tl         = I'm probably the only person on the continent of Teyvat who uses the Pyro of my Vision as a rock 'n' roll complement. There are people who criticize me them of using such a noble power, but... if Visions are given by gods, wouldn't it mean that my way [of life] was recognised [by them]?

|vo_07_02_title      = 하고 싶은 이야기・이름 짓기
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = Something to Share: Naming
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share - Naming.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = 이 악기는 내가 직접 만든 거야. 원래는 폰타인의 록 악기를 따라 만든 건데, 만들다 보니 완전 다른 게 됐지 뭐야. 듣기 좋으면서도 기억하기 쉬운 이름을 지어주고 싶어. 「염금」, 「쇄옥」, 「정산」? 뭔가 입에 착 안 붙는데…. 혹시 좋은 아이디어 없어?
|vo_07_02_rm         = I akgineun naega jikjeop mandeun geoya. Wollaeneun Pontain-ui rok akgileul ttara mandeun geonde, mandeulda boni wanjeon dareun ge dwaetji mwoya. Deutgi joh-eumyeonseodo gieokhagi swiun ireum-eul jieojugo sip-eo. "Yeomgeum," "Swaeok," "Jeongsan"? Mwonga ib-e chak an bunneunde... Hoksi joh-eun aidieo eobs-eo?
|vo_07_02_tl         = I made this instrument by myself. It was originally made after Fontaine's rock instrument, but as I made it, it became something completely different. I want to give it a name that sounds good and is easy to remember. [How about] "Fyre Lyre," "Jadebreaker," [or] "Hill Stiller"? Something doesn't sound right... any good ideas? <!-- should include note about this being the official English translation instead of localised from scratch-->

|vo_07_03_title      = 하고 싶은 이야기・연악
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Something to Share: Opera
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share - Opera.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = 「연악」이라고 들어봤어? 돈 많은 사람들이 연회에서 듣는 음악인데, 이 사람이 얼마나 대단한지 또 저 사람이 얼마나 위대한지에 대해 노래해…. 음악을 그렇게 사용하다니, 쳇, 전혀 로큰롤하지 않다고
|vo_07_03_rm         = 
|vo_07_03_tl         = Have you ever heard of "opera"? It's the music that rich people listen to at banquets, and they sing about how great this person is and how great that person is... With that kind of music, bah, it's not rock 'n' roll at all.

|vo_07_04_title      = 흥미있는 일…
|vo_07_04_subtitle   = Interesting Things
|vo_07_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_04_tx         = 내가 제일 좋아하는 무대의상은 내가 직접 「예상꽃」으로 짠 거야. 너도 그 꽃 본 적 있지? 빨갛고 정열적이잖아! 게다가 내 로큰롤하고도 잘 어울린다구!
|vo_07_04_rm         = Naega jeil joh-ahaneun mudaeuisang-eun naega jikjeop "Yesang-kkot"-euro jjan geoya. Neodo geu kkot bon jeog itji? Ppalgako jeong-yeoljeog-ijanh-a! Gedaga nae rokeunnolhagodo jal eoullindagu!
|vo_07_04_tl         = My favorite stage costumes are the ones I made myself with Silk Flowers. Have you ever seen that flower? It's red and hot! Plus, it goes well with my rock 'n' roll!

|vo_08_01_title      = 향릉에 대해…
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Xiangling]]
|vo_08_01_friendship = 4
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Xiangling.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = 난 「만민당」에 자주 야식을 먹으러 가. 향릉이 바쁘지 않으면 밤늦게까지 수다를 떨어. 응? 뭘 시키냐고? 음… 사실 향릉이 만드는 건 다 먹어, 하하. 매번 달라. 맛도 천차만별이고. 향릉은 요리계의 「로큰롤 스타」라고 할 수 있지!
|vo_08_01_rm         = Nan "Manmin-dang"-e jaju yasig-eul meog-eureo ga. Hyangreung-i bappeuji anh-eumyeon bamneutgekkaji sudareul tteor-eo. Eung? Mwol sikinyago? Eum... sasil Hyangreung-i mandeuneun geon da meog-eo, haha. Maebeon dalla. Matdo cheonchamanbyeor-igo. Hyangreung-eun yorigyeui "rokeunnol seuta"-rago hal su itji!
|vo_08_01_tl         = I often go to Wanmin Restaurant for late night snacks. If Xiangling is not busy, we chat until late at night. Hm? What do I order? Well... Actually, I eat everything Xiangling makes, haha. It's different every time. The taste is also different. Xiangling can be said to be the “rock 'n' roll star” of the culinary world!

|vo_08_02_title      = 종려에 대해…
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About [[Zhongli]]
|vo_08_02_friendship = 4
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Zhongli.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = 아무도 내 로큰롤을 들어주지 않던 어느 날, 그가 날 찾아와서 그가 있는 곳에서 연주해보지 않겠냐는 거야. 합이 맞으면 전속 가수가 될 수 있다면서 말이지. 드디어 내 음악을 알아주는 사람이 있다는 생각에 설레더라구! 바로 오케이하고 따라갔는데, 그제서야 그 사람이 「왕생당」의 객경이란 걸 알았어…. 너무 안 어울리잖아. 정말 괴짜 같은 사람이야
|vo_08_02_rm         = Amudo nae rokeunnol-eul deur-eojuji anteon eoneu nal, geuga nal chaj-awaseo geuga itneun gos-eseo yeonjuhaeboji ankennyaneun geoya. Hab-i maj-eumyeon jeonsok gasuga doel su itdamyeonseo mar-iji. Deudieo nae eum-ag-eul ar-ajuneun saram-i itdaneun saeng-gag-e seolledeoragu! Baro okeihago ttaraganneunde, geujeseoya geu saram-i "Wangsaeng-dang"-ui gaekgyeong-iran geol ar-ass-eo... Neomu an eoullijanh-a. Jeongmal goejja gat-eun saram-iya
|vo_08_02_tl         = One day, when no one listened to my rock 'n' roll, he came to me and asked me to play where he was. He said that if we click, I can become an exclusive singer. I was thrilled to think that there was finally someone who recognized my music! Right away I said, "Okay," and followed, but only then did I find out that the person was the consultant of Wangsheng [Funeral] Parlor... It's so conflicting. What an oddball that person is.

|vo_08_03_title      = 응광에 대해…
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About [[Ningguang]]
|vo_08_03_friendship = 4
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Ningguang.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = 천암군 알지? 예전에 그 녀석들이 날 엄청 방해했었어. 여기에 무대를 세우면 안 된다, 저기도 안 된다. 귀찮아 죽는 줄 알았다니깐! 흠흠, 그러다 내가 총무부에 신고하니까 그 「천권성」이 리월의 그…뭐더라, 아무튼 무슨 규율을 개정했는데 공연 전용 장소를 정했다더라고. 허가도 받아야 된다던데. 휴…여전히 귀찮긴 하지만 그래도 예전처럼 이리저리 쫓겨나지 않아도 되니깐
|vo_08_03_rm         = Cheon-amgun alji? Yejeon-e geu nyeoseokdeur-i nal eomcheong banghaehaess-eoss-eo. Yeogie mudaereul se-umyeon an doenda, jeogido an doenda. Gwichanh-a jukneun jul ar-atdanikkan! Heumheum, geureoda naega chongmubue sin-gohanikka geu "Cheong Wonseong"-i Riwo-rui geu... mwodeola, amuteun museun gyuyul-eul gaejeonghaenneunde gong-yeon jeon-yong jangsoreul jeonghaetdadeorago. Heogado bad-aya doendadeonde. Hyu... yeojeonhi gwichankin hajiman geuraedo yejeoncheoleom irijeori jjotgyeonaji anh-ado doenikkan
|vo_08_03_tl         = You know the Millelith? In the past, those people have been in my way too much. You can't set a stage here, and you can't do it there. I thought I was going to die of boredom! Huh-huh, then when I reported to the Ministry of Civil Affairs, the "Great Tianquan" was in Liyue... Anyway, some said that she revised some rules and decided on dedicated venues for performing. I'd need to get a permit myself. Sigh... it's still annoying, but I don't have to get kicked out like I used to.

|vo_08_04_title      = 백출에 대해…
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About [[Baizhu]]
|vo_08_04_friendship = 4
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Baizhu.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = 백출 선생의 목 관리 처방전은 효과가 최고야. 한번은 고마워서 즉흥적으로 로큰롤을 불렀는데…백출 선생이 기르던 그 뱀이 기절해 버리더라고. 그때부터 그 뱀은 나만 보면 백출 선생 옷깃으로 숨어. 하하하, 뱀이 진동에 예민한 동물이란 걸 그때 알았어
|vo_08_04_rm         = Baekchul seonsaeng-ui mok gwalli cheobangjeon-eun hyogwaga choegoya. Hanbeon-eun gomawoseo jeukheungjeog-euro rokeunnor-eul bulleotneunde... Baekchul seonsaeng-i gireudeon geu baem-i gijeolhae beorideorago. Geuttaebuteo geu baem-eun naman bomyeon Baekchul seonsaeng otgis-euro sum-eo. Hahaha, baem-i jindong-e yeminhan dongmur-iran geol geuttae ar-ass-eo
|vo_08_04_tl         = Dr. Baizhu's vocal care prescription is the best.  I once sang some improvised rock 'n' roll as a thank-you. The snake that Dr. Baizhu had raised passed out. Since then, the snake hid under Dr. Baizhu's collar only when I see him. Hahaha, I then learned that snakes are sensitive to vibrations.

|vo_08_05_title      = 북두에 대해…
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About [[Beidou]]
|vo_08_05_friendship = 4
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Beidou.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = 아, 그녀는 시원시원하고 통이 커서 말이 잘 통해. 「사조성」호에서 겪은 이야기들은 너무 멋있어서 내 로큰롤에 지대한 영감을 주지! 헤헤, 그들을 위해 노래도 따로 만들어줬어. 이제 내가 첫 소절만 불러도 선원들이 다 따라 부른다니까. 이러다 그냥 뱃노래가 되겠어!
|vo_08_05_rm         = A, geunyeoneun siwonsiwonhago tong-i keoseo mar-i jal tonghae. "Sajoseong"-ho-eseo gyeokk-eun iyagideur-eun neomu meos-iss-eoseo nae rokeunnor-e jidaehan yeong-gam-eul juji! Hehe, geudeur-eul wihae noraedo ttaro mandeur-eojwoss-eo. Ije naega cheot sojeolman bulleodo seon-wondeur-i da ttara bureundanikka. Ireoda geunyang baennoraega doegess-eo!
|vo_08_05_tl         = Oh, she's cool, she's great, and she's good at talking. Stories from The Crux are so cool that they inspire me a lot for my rock 'n' roll! Hehe, I made a song for them as well. Now, even if I sing the first verse, all the sailors sing along. This will just be a boat song!

|vo_08_06_title      = 중운에 대해…
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About [[Chongyun]]
|vo_08_06_friendship = 4
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Chongyun.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = 걘 얌전하고 내성적인 것 같지만 진짜 재밌어! 한번은 공연하는데 친구한테 불려 나온 것 같더라고. 나한테 무슨 말을 하려던 거 같았는데, 무대 소리가 너무 커서 제대로 듣지도 못했어. 근데 어느샌가 쏜살같이 무대로 올라오더니 나랑 같이 노랠 부르는 거야. 그것도 엄청 로큰롤답게. 역시 「사람은 외모로 판단하면 안 된다」니까!
|vo_08_06_rm         = Gyaen yamjeonhago naeseongjeog-in geot gatjiman jinjja jaemiss-eo! Hanbeon-eun gong-yeonhaneunde chinguhante bullyeo naon geot gatdeorago. Nahante museun mar-eul haryeodeon geo gat-anneunde, mudae soriga neomu keoseo jedaero deutjido mothaess-eo. Geunde eoneusaen-ga ssonsalgach-i mudaero ollaodeoni narang gat-i norael bureuneun geoya. Geugeotdo eomcheong rokeunnoldapge. Yeoksi "saram-eun oemoro pandanhamyeon an doenda"-nikka!
|vo_08_06_tl         = That kid seems to be meek and introverted, but he's really fun! One time, while performing, I felt a friend called to me. I thought he was trying to tell me something, but the sound at the stage was so loud I couldn't hear him properly. And another time, he suddenly came up to the stage and sang with me. It was very rock 'n' roll. After all, "you shouldn’t judge a person by their looks"!

|vo_08_07_title      = 호두에 대해…
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Hu Tao]]
|vo_08_07_friendship = 4
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Hu Tao.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = 그녀는 왕생당의 당주인데도 언제나 즐거워 보여. 무슨 생각을 하는 건지 도통 모르겠다니까. 거리에서 마주치면 나한테 거리낌 없이 인사하면서 「불장난을 좋아하는 사람은 분명 장사가 번창할 거야」라나 뭐라나…. 음, 조, 좀 이상해
|vo_08_07_rm         = Geunyeoneun Wangsaeng-dang-ui dangju-indedo eonjena jeulgeowo boyeo. Museun saeng-gag-eul haneun geonji dotong moreugetdanikka. Georieseo majuchimyeon nahante georikkim eobs-i insahamyeonseo "buljangnan-eul joh-ahaneun saram-eun bunmyeong jangsaga beonchangal geoya"-rana mworana... eum, jo, jom isanghae
|vo_08_07_tl         = Although she is the head of the Wangsheng [Funeral] Parlor, she always looks happy. And I have no idea what she's thinking. When we run into each other on the street, she greets me without hesitation and says something like, "Those who like to play with fire will surely thrive," or something... Um, it's kind of&mdash; kind of weird.

|vo_08_08_title      = 운근에 대해…
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About [[Yun Jin]]
|vo_08_08_friendship = 4
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Yun Jin.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = 이건 비밀이니까 여기저기 말하고 다니면 안 돼. 그 사람은 로큰롤을 엄청 좋아해. 아무리 바빠도 일주일에 세 번 이상은 내 노랠 들으러 온다니까. 「화유다관」 극단 최고의 배우는 취미도 고상할 줄 알았는데, 평소에 쌓인 게 많았나 봐, 하하하
|vo_08_08_rm         = Igeon bimir-inikka yeogijeogi malhago danimyeon an dwae. Geu saram-eun rokeunnol-eul eomcheong joh-ahae. Amuri bappado ilju-ir-e se beon isang-eun nae norael deur-eureo ondanikka. "Hwayu-Dagwan" geukdan choegoui baeuneun chwimido gosanghal jul ar-assneunde, pyeongso-e ssah-in ge manh-anna bwa, hahaha
|vo_08_08_tl         = This is a secret, so you shouldn't talk about it here and there. She really likes rock 'n' roll. No matter how busy she is, she come to listen to my songs at least three times a week. I thought that the best actors in the "Heyu Tea House" Troupe would have noble hobbies, but I guess they have a lot of stuff in their day-to-day lives, hahaha!

|vo_09_01_title      = 신염에 대해 알기・첫 번째
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = 나에 대해 알고 싶어? 하하, 사람들은 보통 날 보면 멀찌감치 피하던데 넌 참 이상해. 좋아, 그럼…내 로큰롤부터 알아가 볼래?
|vo_09_01_rm         = Na-e daehae algo sip-eo? Haha, saramdeur-eun botong nal bomyeon meoljjigamchi pihadeonde neon cham isanghae. Joh-a, geureom... nae rokeunnolbuteo ar-aga bollae?
|vo_09_01_tl         = You want to know about me?  Haha, people usually avoid me when they see me, and you are so peculiar. Okay, so... do you want to know about my rock 'n' roll?

|vo_09_02_title      = 신염에 대해 알기・두 번째
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_friendship = 3
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = 어릴 때, 어른들은 다들 나한테 얌전하게 이거 배워라 저거 배워라 했지만, 성격상 잘 안 되더라고. 항상 꾸중만 들었지. 하지만 로큰롤은 달라. 누가 가르쳐주지 않았는데도 잘했거든. 어른들은 「여자애답지 않다」라고 하는데…. 휴, 이런 걸 고정 관념이라고 하지
|vo_09_02_rm         = Eoril ttae, eoreundeur-eun dadeul nahante yamjeonhage igeo baewora jeogeo baewora haetjiman, seong-gyeoksang jal an doedeorago. Hangsang kkujungman deur-eotji. Hajiman rokeunnol-eun dalla. Nuga gareuchyeojuji anh-anneundedo jalhaetgeodeun. Eoreundeur-eun "yeojaaedabji anta"-rago haneunde... Hyu, ireon geol gojeong gwannyeom-irago haji
|vo_09_02_tl         = When I was young, all the adults told me to learn this and learn that, but it didn't work out because of my personality. I was always scolded. But rock 'n' roll is different. I did well even though no one taught me. Adults say, "You're not like a girl"... Sigh, talk about stereotyping...

|vo_09_03_title      = 신염에 대해 알기・세 번째
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_friendship = 4
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 나 오늘 좀 달라진 거 없어? 사실 널 만나려고 얼굴 마사지도 하고 눈이랑 입 좀 풀어주면서 거울 보고 30분 동안이나 웃는 연습을 했어. 어때? 덜 사나워 보이지?…예전보다 더 사나워 보인다고? 으…
|vo_09_03_rm         = Na oneul jom dallajin geo eobs-eo? Sasil neol mannaryeogo eolgul masajido hago nun-irang ip jom pur-eojumyeonseo geoul bogo 30-bun dong-an-ina utneun yeonseub-eul haess-eo. Eottae? Deol sanawo boiji?... Yejeonboda deo sanawo boindago? Eu...
|vo_09_03_tl         = Has anything about me changed today? Actually, before meeting you, I massaged my face, relaxed my eyes and mouth, looked in the mirror and practiced smiling for 30 minutes. How is it? Do I look less intense...? More intense than before? Uh...

|vo_09_04_title      = 신염에 대해 알기・네 번째
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_friendship = 5
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = 나랑 같이 악기 연습하느라 수고했어! 곧 점심시간이니까 밥 먹자. 네 몫도 준비했어! 토마토랑 소시지, 계란후라이도 있어…. 뭐? 난 이런 거 못 하게 생겼다고? 야, 얕잡아보지 마! 요리하고 귀여운 포즈를 잡는 것쯤이야, 못, 못할 것도 없지!
|vo_09_04_rm         = Narang gach-i akgi yeonseuphaneura sugohaess-eo! Got jeomsimsigan-inikka bap meokja. Ni mokdo junbihaess-eo! Tomatotang sosiji, gyeranhuraido iss-eo... Mwo? Nan ireon geo mot hage saeng-gyeotdago? Ya, yatjab-aboji ma! Yorihago gwiyeoun pojeulrul jabmneun geotjjeum-iya, mot, mothal geosdo eobsji!
|vo_09_04_tl         = You did a great job practicing playing with me! It's lunch time soon, so let's eat. I prepared your meal too! There are tomatoes and sausages, and fried eggs... What? Are you saying I didn't do this? Hey, don't underestimate me! Cooking is no problem, just like making cute poses. There's&mdash; there's nothing I can't do!

|vo_09_05_title      = 신염에 대해 알기・다섯 번째
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_friendship = 6
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = 난 로큰롤의 반항 정신이 맘에 들어. 그렇다고 내가 개성 강한 것만 좋아하는 건 아니야. 나도 평범한 생활을 할 줄 안다고. 바느질도 하고, 꽃이나 물고기도 키우고, 아기자기하게 요리도 하고, 뭐든, 그리고…누구든 좋아할 수 있는 거잖아. 안 그래?
|vo_09_05_rm         = Nan rokeunnor-ui banhang jeongsin-i mam-e deur-eo. Geureotago naega gaeseong ganghan geotman joh-ahaneun geon aniya. Nado pyeongbeomhan saenghwar-eul hal jul andago. Baneujildo hago, kkoch-ina mulgogido kiugo, agijagihage yorido hago, mwodeun, geurigo... nugudeun joh-ahal su inneun geojanh-a. An geurae?
|vo_09_05_tl         = I like the rebellious spirit of rock 'n' roll. But that doesn't mean I only like otrong traits. I know how to lead an ordinary life. Sewing, growing flowers and fish, cooking nice things, et cetera, and... I can be into anyone I like. Isn't it so?

|vo_10_01_title      = 신염의 취미…
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = 취미는 당연히 로큰롤이지! 뭔가에 완전히 빠져든 적 있어? 가장 좋아하는 것과 하나가 될 땐, 시간이나 공간 따윈 중요치 않아. 맘껏 즐기고 발산하는 거지&mdash;&mdash;맞아맞아! 그런 느낌은 수백 번, 수천 번 느껴도 모자라!
|vo_10_01_rm         = Chwimineun dang-yeonhi rokeunnor-iji! Mwonga-e wanjeonhi ppajyeodeun jeok iss-eo? Gajang joh-ahaneun geotgwa hanaga doel ttaen, sigan-ina gong-gan ttawin jung-yochi anh-a. Mamkkeot jeulgigo balsanhaneun geoji&mdash;&mdash; Maj-amaj-a! Geureon neukkim-eun subaek beon, sucheon beon neukkyeodo mojara!
|vo_10_01_tl         = Obviously, my hobby is rock 'n' roll! Have you ever been completely obsessed with something? When you become one with what you like the most, time and space don't matter. It's all about having fun and letting go&mdash; That's right, that's right! Feeling that sensation hundreds, or even thousands of times, is not enough!

|vo_10_02_title      = 신염의 고민…
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = 어린애들이 길에서 나랑 눈이 마주치면 항상 놀라서 울어. 휴, 덜 사납게 보이는 법 어디 없을까? 생각나는 방법은 다 써봤는데 아무런 소용도 없었어…
|vo_10_02_rm         = Eorin-aedeur-i gir-eseo narang nun-i majuchimyeon hangsang nollaseo ur-eo. Hyu, deol sanapge boineun beop eodi eobs-eulkka? Saeng-gangnaneun bangbeob-eun da sseobwanneunde amureon soyongdo eobs-eoss-eo...
|vo_10_02_tl         = When children see me on the street, they always cry in shock. Sigh, is there any way to look less intense? I tried everything I can think of, but to no avail...

|vo_10_03_title      = 좋아하는 음식…
|vo_10_03_subtitle   = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = 리월항 선박 관리국의 점심은 정말 맛있어! 기름기도 적당하고, 고기도 넉넉해. 종류가 다양하진 않지만 아무리 먹어도 질리질 않아! 그러니까 점심 한 끼 먹자고 관리국에서 온종일 일하는 것도 손해는 아니라니까!
|vo_10_03_rm         = Riwol-Hang seonbak gwalligug-ui jeomsim-eun jeongmal mas-iss-eo! Gireumgido jeogdanghago, gogido neongneokhae. Jongnyuga dayanghajin anchiman amuri meog-eodo jillijil anh-a! Geureonikka jeomsim han kki meokjago gwalligug-eseo onjong-il ilhaneun geotdo sonhaeneun aniranikka!
|vo_10_03_tl         = Lunch at Liyue Harbor's Shipyard Administration is so delicious! The fat is just right, and the meat is rich. Although there isn't much variety, no matter how much you eat, you will never get tired of it! It's really no loss to work all day at the Shipyard just to have lunch!

|vo_10_04_title      = 싫어하는 음식…
|vo_10_04_subtitle   = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = 딱히 편식하는 건 없지만 멀겋고 싱거운 요리는 별로 안 좋아해. 음식은 짜고 매워야 먹을 맛이 나지! 「진주비취백옥탕」 만들 재료밖에 없다면 찍어 먹을 고춧가루라도 준비하겠어!
|vo_10_04_rm         = Ttakhi pyeonsikhaneun geon eopjiman meolgeoko sing-geoun yorineun byeollo an joh-ahae. Eumsig-eun jjago maewoya meog-eul mas-i naji! "Jinjubichwibaeg-og Tang" mandeul jaeryobakk-e eopdamyeon jjig-eo meog-eul gochutgarurado junbihagess-eo!
|vo_10_04_tl         = I'm not exactly a picky eater, but I don't like dull and bland dishes. Food has to be salty and spicy to taste good! Even if I only had ingredients to make “Jewelry Soup”, I'd even prepare red pepper powder for dipping!

|vo_11_01_title      = 생일…
|vo_11_01_subtitle   = Birthday
|vo_11_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_11_01_tx         = 생일 축하해! 봐, 내가 특별히 만든 자수야. 폰타인의 인형 모양을 참고해서 우리 둘을 위에 새겼어. 너무 귀엽지? …왜 그렇게 쳐다봐? 내, 내가 자수 놓는 게 그렇게 이상한 일이야?
|vo_11_01_rm         = Saeng-il chukhahae! Bwa, naega teukbyeolhi mandeun jasuya. Pontain-ui inhyeong moyang-eul chamgohaeseo uri dur-eul wie saegyeoss-eo. Neomu gwiyeopji? ...Wae geureoke chyeodabwa? Nae, naega jasu nohneun ge geureoke isanghan ir-iya?
|vo_11_01_tl         = Happy Birthday! Look, I made some special embroidery. I printed the two of us on the top, just like to the shape of dolls in Fontaine. Isn't it really cute? ...Why are you staring at me like that? My&mdash;my ability to do embroidery is that strange?

|vo_12_01_title      = 돌파의 느낌・기
|vo_12_01_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_12_01_ascension  = 1
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  01.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = 응! 바로 이 리듬이지!
|vo_12_01_rm         = Eung! Baro i rideum-iji!
|vo_12_01_tl         = Hm! Now this is the rhythm!

|vo_12_02_title      = 돌파의 느낌・승
|vo_12_02_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_12_02_ascension  = 2
|vo_12_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  02.ogg
|vo_12_02_tx         = 열기가 엄청난걸! 다음 공연도 기대해줘!
|vo_12_02_rm         = Yeogiga eomcheongnan-geol! Da-eum gong-yeondo gidaehaejwo!
|vo_12_02_tl         = The heat is great! See you at my next performance!

|vo_12_03_title      = 돌파의 느낌・전
|vo_12_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_12_03_ascension  = 4
|vo_12_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  03.ogg
|vo_12_03_tx         = 이렇게 강력한 힘을 손에 넣었으니 독창적인 로큰롤을 만들어 낼 수 있겠어! 고마워, 신곡은 절대 널 실망시키지 않을 거야!
|vo_12_03_rm         = Ireoke gangnyeokhan him-eul son-e neoh-eoss-euni dokchangjeog-in rokeunnor-eul mandeur-eo nael su itgess-eo! Gomawo, singog-eun jeoldae neol silmangsikiji anh-eul geoya!
|vo_12_03_tl         = With having this strong power, I can create more original rock 'n' roll! Thanks, my new songs will never let you down!

|vo_12_04_title      = 돌파의 느낌・결
|vo_12_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_12_04_ascension  = 6
|vo_12_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  04.ogg
|vo_12_04_tx         = 멋져! 네 「열정」이 느껴져! 그럼 내가 너만을 위한 로큰롤을 만들어서 연주해 줄ome게!
|vo_12_04_rm         = Meotjyeo! Ni "yeoljeong"-i neukkyeojyeo! Geureom naega neoman-eul wihan rokeunnor-eul mandeur-eoseo yeonjuhae julge!
|vo_12_04_tl         = Awesome! I can feel your "passion"! With this, I'll make [some] rock 'n' roll and play it, just for you!
}}
